permissions: User must be authorized to create a commitment simulation via the related commitment's CommitmentPolicy (admin or membership as the commitment buyer/seller organization: customer manager, broker member, or trucker manager).
side_effects: Creates a commitment simulation record and enqueues CommitmentSimulationWorker after commit to process it.
validation_notes: commitment-type and commitment-id are required. start-on and end-on are required (YYYY-MM-DD). end-on must be on or after start-on. iteration-count is required and must be between 1 and 1000 inclusive.

flags.name: --commitment-type
flags.description: Commitment type (required). Example values: commitments, customer-commitments.

flags.name: --end-on
flags.validation: Expected format YYYY-MM-DD (e.g., 2026-01-23) and must be on or after --start-on.

flags.name: --iteration-count
flags.validation: Must be an integer between 1 and 1000 inclusive.
